text:
On copying a sampler having child elements between thread groups, the child elements get moved under the thread group.

The Child elements of the sampler need to remain under the sampler.

eg. 

Test Plan
  -- Thread Group
     --Sampler
         --child 1
         --child 2

On copying becomes

Test Plan
  -- Thread Group
     --Sampler
     --child 1
     --child 2
creator: vipul_paikane@persistent.co.in

text:

Child elements like Regex matchers and header managers

text:

What (exactly) did you do to cause the problem?

creator: vipul_paikane@persistent.co.in
text:
It works for a single sampler and even for multiple few sapmples using the 'CTRL' key, but the issue arises for selecting multiple samplers using 'Shift'.

Try selecting multiple samplers in line using 'Shif't key and copy pasting in between samplers.

creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
Again, works for me.

If you collapse all the samplers and SHIFT select them, they copy fine.

However, if you SHIFT select across multiple samplers with the child elements expanded, both the sampler and its children are selected; both are copied.

Same applies if you CONTROL select a sampler and its children.

Selecting a node copies the node and all its children.
If you select a child as well as its parent, both will be copied.

This is working correctly.

creator: vipul_paikane@persistent.co.in
text:
Ok, that means we need to collapse all and copy for correct hierarchy.

Thanks Sebb.
